com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch

Class StartupEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch.StartupEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameEnvironment

    public abstract class StartupEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameEnvironment
    Container for startup environment state which also parses the command line options.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith
